body_html:
After trying installing and uninstalling, it looks like it only happens when installing from source.
pip install tensorflow or tensorflow-gpu works well. But once installed from source with bazel, this problem happens.

pip install tensorflow or tensorflow-gpu works well. But once installed from source with bazel, this problem happens.
body:
After trying installing and uninstalling, it looks like it only happens when installing from source.
pip install tensorflow or tensorflow-gpu works well. But once installed from source with bazel, this problem happens.
